reviewText: Dont waste your time or money this is junk from beginning to end. Just a lousy piece of reproductive work from this company that ought to be ashamed of itself.

I hope they release the remaining seasons 3, 4, 5, 6, and final season 7 on digital video disc.
The Beverly hillbillies and green acres should be completed as well.
I don't know why this got such poor reviews. It is very cool!  Gotta love old school b/w TV shows. Brings back fond memories.

I used to watch petticoat junction a long time ago as a young guy and like I said I like most of  the  comedy shows of the 1950's through the 1972 era back when the actors put  a good laugh on the show

My favorite show but this really stinks Same episodes as other budget releases and picture on the front of the DVD may make you think that the episodes are from season 3 WRONG they're not. true PJ fans that have the first 2 seasons and the ultimate collection don't waste your money or time on this DVD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
